inlineContent.text: We’ve had a rough couple months. I’ve been in the fun situation of simultaneously being grossly overworked and overdrawing my bank account. The novelty of owning our own business has worn off and now we’re only continuing through sheer willpower.
It feels like we’re between waves in the ocean right now. We’ve overcome a good amount by surviving for a year. But we still can’t see land — just a wall of water.
Hopefully land is just the other side of it.

abstract.text: David Brunow, known as Brunow [ˈbɹunoʊ] to the folks he works with, is a human living on Earth. You might have something in common with him — if you think it is ridiculous that he is talking about himself in the first person here, so does he.
